function Card({ title, description, price, onAddToCart }) { const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const handleAddToCart = () => { setShowModal(true); onAddToCart({ title, price }); }; return (
{title}

{description}

{showModal && (
setShowModal(false)}>×

{title}

{price}

)}
); } export default Card;
